disease: Merkel cell carcinoma of left upper limb, including shoulder

symptoms.name: Skin growth
symptoms.pattern: Most often the first symptom; can be a mole, freckle, or bump that changes size, shape, or color; may grow fast or bleed easily after minor injury

physical_findings: Smooth skin surface with enlarged, visible blood vessels (in some cases)
risk_factors: Less melanin in the skin (more common in white people)
